title: Bug 36684BIDI: LTRoriented MessageBox can't be created, if it's parent has RTL orientation.
description: Currently MesageBox is always created with MBRTLREADING bit, if it's parenthas rtl orientation. It isn't correct, because it is supposed, that MessageBoxshould be created with orientation, which correspond to explicitly assignedorientation style. Only if orientation style isn't assigned, MessageBox shouldinherit orientation from it's parent.
